text: Locus Energy - Solar Monitoring startup in San Francisco. ?Looking for developers. Come learn about solar power, the grid, virtual irradiance (huh?) and build really fun/weird things for data scientists to help make solar power more affordable for homeowners. We're currently trying to staff up so there are a few positions available. Front end / back end / full stack... whatever you are, we'd love to hear from you. hr_tech@locusenergy.com
